ISSUE.TITLE: [Kanban] Empty record in `uncategorised` stack
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? https://www.loom.com/share/67430f6f50c945ba8854738da38abe9f a record somehow persists in uncategorized section - leading to CY test failure Error observed on browser ``` Error: TypeError: _ctx.removeRowIfNew is not a function at $setup.expandedFormRow.$setup.expandedFormDlg._createBlock.onUpdate:modelValue._cache.<computed>._cache.<computed> (Kanban.vue:509:31) at callWithErrorHandling (runtime-core.esm-bundler.js:155:22) at callWithAsyncErrorHandling (runtime-core.esm-bundler.js:164:21) at callWithAsyncErrorHandling (runtime-core.esm-bundler.js:174:21) at emit$1 (runtime-core.esm-bundler.js:711:9) at runtime-core.esm-bundler.js:7372:53 at ComputedRefImpl.set [as _setter] (index.mjs?v=31a3edc6:5461:9) at ComputedRefImpl.set value [as value] (reactivity.esm-bundler.js:1152:14) at Object.set (reactivity.esm-bundler.js:1060:22) at _createBlock.onUpdate:visible._cache.<computed>._cache.<computed> (index.vue:132:22) ``` ### Desired Behavior Empty record shouldn't be created in Uncategorised stack ### Project Details Node: **v16.14.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **mysql2** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.97.0** ### Attachements _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(nc-gui): use ref<Map<string | null, Row[]>> for formattedData & countByStack

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(nc-gui): remove unnecessary update on LazySmartsheetExpandedForm #3959
